name: All Things In Balance
description:
Place cards down to form a tower and see if they can withstand gravity!

Use the Left Mouse Button to place a card down.

After placing a card down, use "a" and "d" to rotate the card, and use the slider to adjust the card's mass. Press "w" to confirm your changes to the card. 

Click and drag on an existing card to move/edit it.

Press enter to enable gravity and see if your tower stands, Press "r" to reset the game.
